EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners/Zintro Follow Up (1342625046.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners/Zintro Follow Up (1342625046.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Pedro, Thank you for requesting more information from MBO Partners. Below you’ll find the links to information you requested: - You’re copy of the consulting rate guide is broken out into three calculation methods which are hyperlinked from our table of contents which you can access by clicking here <http://www.mbopartners.com/files/pdfs/mbo-bill-rate-resource-guide.pdf>. - Short 2 minute video <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4> on MBO. At this time MBO only conducts business in the United States, if anything changes we will most certinly reach out. Thanks again for reaching out and best of luck, Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
